shadow.name: CONFLICT
shadow.description: Emotional friction seeking resolution through confrontation
shadow.somatic_signature: Solar plexus turbulence, hot flashes of emotion
shadow.thought_pattern: Something is wrong. We need to fight this out.

gift.name: DIPLOMACY
gift.description: Navigating emotional fields with grace, finding peace through patience
gift.behavioral_signature: Calm mediation, waiting out emotional storms
gift.somatic_signature: Steady through emotional waves, grounded presence
gift.thought_pattern: This feeling will pass. No need to act on it now.

siddhi.name: PEACE
siddhi.description: Complete transcendence of emotional reactivity, inner stillness
siddhi.somatic_signature: Unshakeable calm, eye of the storm
siddhi.thought_pattern: All emotions are weather. I am the sky.

diagnosis.distortion: Acting from Wave Peak or Trough

inversion_protocols.script: You are not solving anything by confronting during an emotional wave. The Solar Plexus is a motor—it generates emotional energy that needs to be witnessed, not acted upon immediately. True clarity comes after the wave completes. Wait 24-72 hours before making decisions or confronting.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel the emotional wave in your solar plexus. Notice it's a wave—it will pass. You don't need to do anything with it right now.

experiment.hypothesis: If I wait 48 hours before responding to emotional triggers, conflicts will resolve naturally.
experiment.action: When emotionally activated, wait 48 hours before responding. Journal the wave. Observe how it changes.

success_criteria.target: Fewer escalated conflicts, more natural resolutions
